original_text: But when they went to bury her, they found no more of her than the skull and the feet and the palms of her hands.
korean_text: 가서 장사하려 한즉 그 두골과 발과 그의 손 외에는 찾지 못한지라

sentences.original_text: But when they went to bury her,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들이 그녀를 묻으러 갔을 때,

sentences.original_text: they found no more of her
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그녀의 다른 부분을 찾지 못했는데,

sentences.original_text: and the palms of her hands.
